page.title: 16Tourism survey [cont.]
page.content:
5.When asked if they liked local food, 77% said 'Yes', 5% said 'No,' and 18% didnt know because they hadnt tried it.
6. We asked people, Have you been shopping and do you think the prices are reasonable? 56% of people said they had been shopping and the prices are reasonable; 28% people said they had not been shopping at all. 7.Everyone who was asked liked the new sea defence wall and thought that it was a good idea. 8. When asked, What is your favourite place in Felixstowe? 3% liked the pier, 5% liked Felixstowe Ferry, 9% liked Charlie Manning's Amusements, 15% liked a particular pub, 34% liked the beach, 11% liked the Spa gardens, 2% liked Landguard Common, 5% liked the Prom, 3% liked Old Felixstowe, 13% didn't know.
